source.name: OpenAI model
source.instructions: Drag and drop **ONLY** the necessary code in the box below. As this is python code, Please make sure to indent your code.
source.initial:
import openai
prompts = 'name the largest country'
response = openai.Completion.create(
  model="text-ada-001"
  , prompt=prompts)
print(response['choices'][0]['text'].strip()) 
 model="text-curie-001"#distractor
 model="text-babage-001"#distractor
 model="text-davinci-001"#distractor
 print(response)#distractor
source.guidance: The lowest cost model is `ada` and we have to use `print(response['choices'][0]['text'].strip())` in order to print and clean the message being generated.
